SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Interface ClassroomDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteClassroomDAO
public interface ClassroomDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing CRUD operations on classrooms. Defines methods to interact with the classes table in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createClassroom(Classroom classroom)
    Inserts a new classroom into the database.
    List<Classroom>
    getAllClassrooms()
    Retrieves all classrooms from the database.
    Classroom
    getClassroomById(int classId)
    Retrieves a specific classroom by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • createClassroom

      void createClassroom(Classroom classroom) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new classroom into the database.
      Parameters:
      classroom - The Classroom object to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getAllClassrooms

      List<Classroom> getAllClassrooms() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all classrooms from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Classroom objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getClassroomById

      Classroom getClassroomById(int classId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a specific classroom by its ID.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the classroom to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Classroom object, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
